name: Vice, crime and 5 grands in Vegas city
name_original: Vice, crime and 5 grands in Vegas city
description:
Welcome to America, Vegas city. The city of vice and sins, and of course money and crime. Meet Carl, nicknamed Grand Black. He wants to be boss of all crime gang in Vegas. Carl start mission right on middle of street in Vegas suburb. Carl need help of his old friends. So find them.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful America gta style landscape
- Thief auto on streets with throwing driver out of auto
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists and kick
- Many blows
- Moto, cars, auto, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code
- Mad streets full of vice and sins

Download Vice, crime and 5 grands in Vegas city
for free and win the mafia war between crime gangster bands
